apps.name: Cymera Pro Mod
apps.description_vi:
Cymera is a gorgeous photo editor with thousands of filter effects, collage, frames, selfie stickers and the best features for your face and body.
Features:
‚ñ† Beauty Camera
- Professional beauty tools for your skin makeup, slim, face reshape, remove wrinkles, erase pimples and dark circles.
- Hundreds of amazing beauty filters and makeup effects.
+ Meet the smart selfie camera to look exceptional without hassle!
‚ñ† Amazing Filters
- Enjoy our filters for your selfie, nation flag effect, vintage-feel, pastel colors, film-effect, black & white and more!
- Lens flare effects or light laked effects.
- Create your own collection of favorite filters.
+ All filters are free!
‚ñ† Camera Lenses and Silent Mode
- 7 different and fascinating camera lenses.
(Divided lenses/FishEye/Lomo and more)
- Anti-shake, timer, touch shooting, out-focusing option.
- Silent mode to shoot wherever you want without disturbing others.
- Bluetooth connection is available for selfie sticks with remote.
‚ñ† Collage and No Crop Features
- Different types of grid to combine photos (up to 9 photos) into one.
- Blurred background with a simple touch.
‚ñ†  Retouch Your Photos Instantly
- Automatic face recognition (enlarge eyes/smile/slim).
- Liquify, skin corrections (brightening, whitening, concealers).
‚ñ† Shape Your Dream Body
- New body shaping function.
- Easy function to slim your waist.
- The best photo editor to lift your hip.
+ No more bow legs. Get a sexy, shaped legs in few seconds!
‚ñ† Super Easy and Fast Editing Tools
- Brightness/contrast/mosaic/rotate and more.
- Extraordinary effects such as lights/borders/vignette.
- High quality resolution for clean and clear photos.
- 15 different designs of watermark.
- Advanced red eye removal function.
- Add a stunning art effects with color splash feature.
‚ñ† Upgrade Photos With Unique Items
- Trendy face stickers, animal face, flower crown, lovely heart, magazine frame, wallpaper, alphabet, message stickers, greeting card and more!
- Brush feature for hand writings and drawings.
- Variety of fonts in text feature.
‚ñ† Sharing Photos and Smart Gallery
- Organize photos by date, location, selfies, etc.
- Now you can set your edited photos as wallpaper.
+ Send or share your photos on your favorite social media channel or other instant chat!
‚ñ† Language Support
- Korean, English, Spanish, German, Japanese, Chinese (traditional and simplified), Thai, Portuguese, Russian, Indonesian, Turkish, and Vietnamese.
rk
We do not provide the service/content for any minors under 16 years old (or equivalent minimum age in relevant jurisdiction). If you are a minor meeting the above conditions, you must read the terms of User Agreement and use this app under the guidance of your guardian, and confirm that your guardian agrees to your Use of this app..
Get the lastest news and recent events of Cymera.
Official channel:
- http://www.facebook.com/CymeraApp
Thank you for using Cymera. :)

apps.name: AnkiDroid Premium Mod
apps.description_vi:
Memorize anything with AnkiDroid!
AnkiDroid lets you learn flashcards very efficiently by showing them just before you will forget. It is fully compatible with the spaced repetition software Anki (including synchronization), which is available for Windows, Linux and MacOS.
Study all sorts of things wherever and whenever you want. Make good use of idle times on bus trips, in supermarket queues or any other waiting situation!
Create your own flashcard decks or download free decks compiled for many languages and topics (more than 6000 available).
Add material through the desktop application Anki or directly through Ankidroid. The application even supports adding material automatically from a dictionary!
‚òÖ Key features:
‚Ä¢ supported flashcard contents: text, images, sounds, LaTeX
‚Ä¢ spaced repetition (supermemo 2 algorithm)
‚Ä¢ text-to-speech integration
‚Ä¢ more than 6000 premade decks
‚Ä¢ progress widget
‚Ä¢ detailed statistics
‚Ä¢ syncing with AnkiWeb
‚Ä¢ open source
‚òÖ Additional features:
‚Ä¢ write answers (optional)
‚Ä¢ whiteboard
‚Ä¢ card editor/adder
‚Ä¢ card browser
‚Ä¢ tablet layout
‚Ä¢ import existing collection files (via Anki Desktop)
‚Ä¢ dictionary integration (ColorDict, GoldenDict, Leo.org, Aedict, diverse web dictionaries)
‚Ä¢ add cards by intent from other applications like dictionaries
‚Ä¢ custom font support
‚Ä¢ full backup system
‚Ä¢ navigation by swipe, tap, shake
‚Ä¢ fully customisable
‚Ä¢ dynamic deck handling
‚Ä¢ night mode
‚Ä¢ 27 localisations
‚Ä¢ All previous AnkiDroid versions can be downloaded from the website

apps.name: Mimo Premium Mod
apps.description_vi:
Learn coding in Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, or SQL, and master modern AI-assisted development to become a developer in the age of AI. Mimo is a coding app that takes you from zero to building projects with AI. Gain the knowledge and tools to create production-ready software and pursue a job as a developer. Start building strong portfolio projects today, learn to code, future-proof your skills, and take the next step in launching your developer career now!
Who It's For
Mimo stands out by guiding aspiring developers through a proven, structured learning process. Unlike other programming apps that focus on passive tutorials in Python, JavaScript, HTML, or quick AI tricks, Mimo delivers hands-on, career-relevant coding skills. You progress from your first line of code to mastering AI-assisted software development, building a portfolio of real-world apps that showcase your abilities.
What You Get With Mimo
Mimo is an all-in-one programming app that offers guided learning paths in Python, HTML, and more, along with an AI-powered environment to help you learn programming and build functional apps, games, and websites.
- Learn coding fundamentals of Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, and more.
- Go from beginner to developer with structured paths in AI-driven Front-End, Full-Stack, Python, and Backend development.
- Build apps, websites, and tools for a professional portfolio that stands out.
- Practice AI-powered software development by building with AI to understand, edit, and improve your code‚Äîall reflecting how modern software is built.
- Code anywhere with our mobile IDE. Write, run, and edit Python, JavaScript, and HTML directly in the app.
- Master collaboration, tooling, and workflows used by modern developers.
- Track progress, earn certificates, and stay motivated with streaks and leaderboards.
How It Works
1. Learn to code in Python, HTML, JavaScript, etc., step by step.
2. Build with AI like modern developers.
3. Create lasting projects.
What Makes Mimo Different
- Mimo combines hands-on coding with AI-powered development tools.
From your first project, you gain practical skills for today‚Äôs tech industry, supported by project experience and AI-driven learning that sets you apart in the job market.
- Learn coding by building software from the very beginning.
You‚Äôll practice Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, TypeScript, and React. Build genuine software from day one‚Äîno waiting through months of tutorials.
- Learn AI-driven software development, not just programming syntax.
Mimo helps you build coding skills faster by using AI to explore solutions, understand code, and move forward with confidence.
- Gain lasting skills and build a portfolio that stays relevant as the industry evolves.
Aiming for a software development career? Mimo offers the skills, practice, and projects to get started.
Learn to code in popular programming languages like Python, HTML, JavaScript, CSS, and SQL, and master AI-assisted, modern software development.
Mimo empowers you to master Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, TypeScript, and more programming languages, such as React, Express, and NodeJS, with just 5 minutes of daily practice. Whether you're a complete beginner or a seasoned developer looking to expand your skillset, Mimo: Learn coding app guides you every step and helps you learn to code. Mimo: Learn Coding/Programming is designed to make learning to code accessible and engaging.
With Mimo: Learn Coding/Programming, you can learn to code on your schedule at your own pace. Practice your programming skills and break into the tech industry. Mimo Learn to Code offers a variety of programming career paths, including Full-Stack, Front-End, Backend development, and Python Developer. Gain the skills and knowledge you need to land your dream job.
Don‚Äôt just learn yesterday‚Äôs coding syntax or chase today‚Äôs vibe coding hype. Get the skills that make you a software developer of tomorrow.
Start learning with Mimo now!

apps.name: PDF Reader Pro Mod
apps.description_vi:
Major new update
Major new updates: Collaborate and share your files in PDF Spaces, turn your document summaries into podcast-style audio, and create standout content in Acrobat Reader with design tools powered by Adobe Express.
The world‚Äôs most trusted PDF reader, PDF editor, and PDF maker with more than 635 million installs. View, share, annotate, add comments, and sign documents - all in one app. You can store your files online and read documents anywhere.
Get your 7-day free trial and try all the features of Acrobat Reader.
Paid features
Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant
‚Ä¢ Work across multiple files in one place with PDF Spaces. Collaborate, store, and use AI Assistant across files
‚Ä¢ Use voice or text prompts with AI Assistant chatbot
‚Ä¢ Ask questions and get cited answers about details in your document, including charts, graphs, and tables with Figures Q&A
‚Ä¢ Easily share the responses you get
‚Ä¢ Try voice support to ask queries and have answers read aloud.
‚Ä¢ Instantly generate summaries from your PDFs with Generative AI Summaries
‚Ä¢ Get content for emails, text, study notes, blogs, and more
[Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant is a paid feature*, free for a limited time]
Edit PDFs
‚Ä¢ With our PDF editor, edit text and images directly in your PDF (mobile only)
‚Ä¢ Fix typos or add paragraphs with the PDF editor
‚Ä¢ Easily add, delete, or rotate any image
‚Ä¢ Use this PDF signer and PDF viewer to get your docs just right
Recognize text
‚Ä¢ Optical Character Recognition (OCR) turns scanned PDFs into searchable, editable text to use in other formats
Merge & organize PDFs with PDF converter
‚Ä¢ Split or combine multiple files into one PDF with PDF converter
‚Ä¢ Use the PDF editor to insert, delete, rotate, crop & reorder pages in your PDF file
Create, convert & export PDFs
‚Ä¢ Easily convert to PDF from any file type including Microsoft, Google Docs, and images
‚Ä¢ Export and convert PDFs to Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, or various image files
‚Ä¢ Convert web pages to PDFs
Compress & highly secure PDFs
‚Ä¢ Compress PDF files for easy saving and sharing
‚Ä¢ Password Protect PDF documents
Have your PDF read aloud
‚Ä¢ Listen to your PDFs on the go, great for reading support
‚Ä¢ Choose free voices or upgrade for high-quality options
Subscribe now to access all these features and use Acrobat across mobile and web platforms.
Free-to-use features
PDF signer: Fill & Sign
Adobe Fill & Sign is free & available in Acrobat Reader. A form filler and PDF signer that lets you fill, sign, and send
Liquid mode for optimal PDF viewing
‚Ä¢ Get the best PDF reading experience with this PDF viewer
‚Ä¢ Search, navigate & adjust font size or spacing to fit your screen
Annotate PDFs
‚Ä¢ Add sticky notes, comments, and highlight text
Store & manage files
‚Ä¢ Link online storage accounts like Microsoft OneDrive, Dropbox, or Google Drive
‚Ä¢ Star files to quickly open important documents
Connect the PDF viewer and reader to Google Drive
‚Ä¢ A PDF creator that lets you edit, compress, and export Google Drive files with a subscription
Work with scanned documents
‚Ä¢ Access scanned PDFs from Adobe Scan in Acrobat to fill, sign, and share
The Acrobat Reader mobile app is designed to work with customers who have Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) enabled.
An Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant add-on plan is available to Acrobat Individual customers.
Terms & Conditions:
Your use of this application is governed by the Adobe General Terms of Use http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_en and the Adobe Privacy Policy http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_en
Do not sell or share my personal information www.adobe.com/go/ca-rights

apps.name: Project Highrise Mod
apps.description_vi:
Welcome to Highrise, your virtual home online where you can connect, play, and express your digital self with existing and soon-to-be friends in amazing shared experiences. Join a community of over 50 million people in a new world full of endless possibilities. Create your avatar, explore fashion, connect with friends, play together and build a world that is uniquely ""you""!
CONNECT THROUGH PLAY
- Dive into a new online space with millions of users.
- Play, create and design together with friends from around the world.
- Join thousands of virtual rooms for games, fashion runways, talent shows, chats or casual hangouts.
- Participate in weekly Events to play and earn new outfits for your avatar.
- Relax in a safe and friendly environment, supported by our world-class team.
EXPRESS YOURSELF
- Create a unique virtual avatar that suits your true self.
- Customize your profile with a background, bio, and showcase your favorite items.
- Explore millions of fashion styles and get inspired by new dress up items.
- Get creative and design items in community contests, brought to life by our talented artists.
- Design virtual rooms for yourself and your friends to enjoy.
SOCIALIZE BEYOND LIMITS
- Use messages or voice chat to connect with friends in virtual worlds.
- Share your experiences through text or media posts on the Feed.
- Follow your friends, grow your community and become a trendsetter.
- Express yourself via avatar emotes: wave, dance, sing, pose.
DESIGN & COLLECT
- Explore a collection of 50,000+ fashion and avatar customization items, with new collections added weekly.
- Track the community-run marketplace to buy and sell your way to a better outfit and profit.
- Every player is an opportunity, inspect their avatar's outfit and offer a trade via the Inbox.
- Keep track of your favorite items by saving them to your personal Wishlist.
- Use filters and categories to easily find exactly what you need.
Start your Highrise journey, where you‚Äôll find genuine moments meet boundless creativity. Play, chat and create!
